website_summaries.verdict: If you want to illuminate your path or light up your garden, this set of 10 solar lights will enhance your outdoor spaces in spite of a few quirks.
pros: Stylish lights that look nice in a garden or along a walkway
Assembling them can be done in mere seconds
Stakes have 2 height options and are easy to push into the ground
cons: Within a set, it's possible that not all lights will offer the same brightness or burn time

customer_reviews.title: GardenBliss solar lights are first class!
customer_reviews.text: The GardenBliss solar lights are fantastic! We have had several different solar lights over the years - but these are the best, the classiest and the brightest we have ever had. They look outstanding in our newly landscaped front yard. We were terribly impressed receiving an informational email from GardenBliss even before we received the lights. And the instructions which came with the lights could not have been clearer and more user-friendly. Thanks to GardenBliss for an excellent product and for superior customer service. We highly recommend the purchase of these solar lights.
customer_reviews.author: Le Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great Solar Lights for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I like these solar lights. They were very easy to put together and even though the stake feels a bit cheap, it is surprisingly durable. They give off more of a blue/white light and are adjustable to two different heights. They have been through a few storms with no issues over the last week, so that is a good sign. I do wish they let off a bit more light, but they work well so far.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Easy solar accent lighting
customer_reviews.text: Im liking these solar light spikes. For years I've used those cheap ones from the department store garden department, and had to replace them every year. These are larger, bigger solar cells, and sealed from weather far better. They light up bright, and last most of the night. It's winter and they get a short charge due to cloudy weather here in Seattle. The posts are heavier and don't break when pushing them into the ground. I also like they came with two post lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice path lights—beautiful, affordable, and great service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights to replace old ones that had quit working. Ordering was quick and easy and they arrived in just a couple of days. The lights and parts were all packaged securely and everything was exactly as described. Assembly was simple but instructions were included. The lights are beautiful—exactly what I wanted. The price was very good compared to all other lights I have looked at. Service was excellent. With zero hesitation I would highly recommend this company and these lights!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great little lights!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something a bit brighter than your average solar lights, and these are perfect! I live in a back house at the end of a long driveway, and delivery people could never find my driveway! I stuck these about 10' apart in the vines lining the fence beside the driveway, and even on cloudy days the lights are bright at night. Love them! Apparently so do others, as two that I had put close to the road have already been stolen! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Wanda R

customer_reviews.title: ... fact that the included rechargeable batteries are next to useless and that the on-off switch is fragile and can ...
customer_reviews.text: If you accept the fact that the included rechargeable batteries are next to useless and that the on-off switch is fragile and can be intermittent, it's an okay choice. Postscript: After a few months, 3 out of 10 have failed. In every case it's the switch. I plan to get my soldering iron out and short-out the switch so the LED is on all the time (but not in daylight). For most folks, it means throwing away 3 out of 10; that's not good. The manufacture should improve the switch.
customer_reviews.author: W. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat them for the price
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two boxes (10ez.) of these outside LED solar lights. They replaced a mishmash of other solar lights that weren't very pleasing to the eye. The new lights work well, are bright white and give the place a nice look in the evening. They also produce enough light to light the sidewalk. When we were assembling them, a stem piece got broken. That's because they are plastic and not the most durable plastic. I contacted the vendor and they replaced the light and even supplied extra. That's great customer service. They've only been in for about a month. We'll see what they look and act like in six months.
customer_reviews.author: Fishin Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not a great buy. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected. We live in the desert so I have sunshine all the time. Our lights lasted maybe a month. I wipe off the tops and still nothing. Batteries should have lasted way longer. Tried recharging and still nothing. Must be in the housing or the solar cell is bad already.
customer_reviews.author: Angel L

customer_reviews.title: Good price per unit, really works, big, bluer colored light.
customer_reviews.text: These little things are excellent and inexpensive. They're much larger than you expect, which is great. I use mine to light a pathway through my field to my outdoor shop. They receive sunlight all day. They stay glowing after sun down around 9pm to about 2am then they start to fade and sputter out. But they recharge all day and do this every day. So far so good. They put out a pleasant cooler color light, not warm light (keep that in mind if mixing lights!). Consider these more of a bluer light than a warmer yellowish light like some others. Price per unit is competitive. Well enough made. I mow by them weekly and they're still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights but 9-12 of them stopped working after 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sets of 10. Charged them as per instructions for the day in full sunlight before placing them in yard. After 2 days 9 of them stopped working completely. And 3 of them are very dim. That's 12 out of 20! Did my research. Either the batteries failed or there bad connections. Either way I'm forced to replace the batteries in the bad ones first to determine what's wrong. I Bought these specifically after reading all reviews. Companies who make solar lights are unfortunately known for using inferior batteries. Had to buy 29.15$ of more batteries. I'll see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best company ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have ordered from Garden Bliss! I had an issue with my lights and contacted Amazon, they did nothing! After my previous review the company contacted me, her name was Jenny. She quickly assured me she was sending me a complete set! They arrived quickly and with my neighbor’s help they will be installed soon. Can’t believe what great customer service they have! I would definitely recommend them for all. Thanks again to Jenny at Garden Bliss!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: Of the ten lights, 3 didn't work. I tried regular batteries and still didn't work. I bought similar lights about 3 years ago for cheaper and they felt better quality than this. Kinda disappointed. For the quality these lights should be about $20 less. You should consider selling individual lamps for about $2 for when the lamps fail. Update : Received a new box with 10 new lights. Good thing is 9 of the 10 worked this time. Lights are fine when they work. Thanks for the replacement box. Really wish I could rate these higher.
customer_reviews.author: Rico V

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade the batteries and they stay on all night
customer_reviews.text: Can't say this was my idea but give this a try. The lamps are very easy to change out the low powered rechargeables for something longer lasting. I used Surepp 24packs AA 1.2V 2850mAh Ni-MH Rechargeable Batteries. So far we have had very overcast days but the lights come on and stay on just about all night. Before I tried this no light I ever used stayed on past midnight. I also used some in solar Christmas lights and they so much brighter.
customer_reviews.author: FairweatherNine

customer_reviews.title: Update: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: After my initial review, I was contacted by the company and sent another set of lights. I’m impressed with both the company’s aim to please their customers and to provide an excellent product. To top it off the new lights all lit up straight out of the box! Good experience; great lights!
customer_reviews.author: MRCLR

customer_reviews.title: Good for walkways
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to see how these lit up at night after I installed them for my wife....disappointed. The lights aren’t as bright as we need them to be but they will do for now. The biggest letdown was that out of ten lights one didn’t work. I even took the stock battery out and replaced it with a fully-charged energizer (NiMH) battery and the light still wouldn’t work. They were, however, very easy to put together. Update: After contacting the company directly they we’re very apologetic about the mishap and sent a replacement light free of charge. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: plexiglass and plastic Solar lights
customer_reviews.text: These are tinyer then I thought The glass is plexiglass they're all plastic was the first thing I didnl like I just put them up last night they have been in Direct sunlight all day today so tonight will be the test because there's supposed to be really bright that's whyi I ordered them in the first place if they're not bright I don't think I can look past the plastic they look cheap if the light are bright I might be able to look past how cheep they look
customer_reviews.author: nyman89

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 packs (20 lights total) and every one of them have been working great from day one. It's only been a week, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous lights! Exceptional customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These little lights look great in my garden! The quality is what one would expect for the price..mostly plastic, but I'm hopefully they will hold up in the rain ans snow expected this winter. So far, they look lovely and provide a nice amount of light. Customer service is exceptional! They will replace these items free of charge if you have broken units. Of the 20 lights I purchased, 4 or 5 of them did not work. They had Amazon ship a full replacement box at no cost within hours of my alerting them to the issue. Hoping these lights last so that I can keep their five star review! Will update in a few month's time if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Max'sMum

customer_reviews.title: They don't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about a month ago. Straight out of the box, 2 lights didn't work. The seller was very responsive and replaced the two lights with another full box. I was initially pleased, thinking I'd have lots of extras in case someone walked on one, but now 3 more lights have stopped working. I'm going through the spare box pretty quickly! The lights are sitting in full sun, which we get a lot of in Florida, so it's clearly a defect with the lights. It's disappointing because they look great when they actually light.
customer_reviews.author: JaxShopper

customer_reviews.title: They actually work great!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are the best! At first I was sceptical Bc all the lights never work but these all work and they stay in the ground easy! Sometimes one goes out and mysteriously starts working again the next night, lol. They are solar, but the battery option is pretty neat as well. The battery life is great! They have been in for a month and still going strong! We have also had heavy winds and rain and none of them came out! Just get them, and for that price! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Vyna

customer_reviews.title: Small batteries- short life
customer_reviews.text: These lights are actually plenty bright (much brighter than smaller ones that I previously bought), but they only came with 200 mAh AA batteries, and on a full charge, don't last more than 3-4 hours. For reference, the rechargeable Energizer AA batteries that I have are 2000 mAh. Other than that, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASE WITH CONFIDENCE
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointed. A few broke and we couldn’t use them all. The ones that are in tact light up well. You just have to make sure it’s in the direct sun light during the day or it won’t be lit up at night. ***UPDATE- the company reached out to me and sent me a new set of lights and they are all perfect. Now I have extras for my back yard too. It’s good to know there still are companies who truly believe in good customer service and go out of their way to make their customers happy and fix the problems. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Mirella Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THE LIGHTS BUT SOME PROBLEMS
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with a few of the lights not working. You have sent me a couple of replacements and I thank you for that, but I now have three more that are not working properly. I have checked the batteries and found one that was not charging, the two others the batteries test good but do not turn on at night. Maybe the photo sensor not detecting night time??? I can cover the sensor and the light will blink but will not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: dougm38

customer_reviews.title: Adequate illumination for a value-priced unit.
customer_reviews.text: I selected these over the cheaper alternatives because it had the fewest negative reviews. I had only modest expectations, having purchased others in the past. 9 of the 10 are working after 3 days. I'll fiddle with #10 to see what's wrong. They are smaller than I expected from the photo, but the light is adequate for soft illumination of a walkway at night. The spikes and shafts are plastic, but the interface is adequately tight (unlike others that I purchased that were very loose). The spikes are rigid enough for insertion into moderately soft soil without first using a metal or wood stake to start the hole. Overall, I am satisfied with the value I obtained at the price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mark Graham

customer_reviews.title: Could be a little brighter!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and install,I like the fact that these lights were made without an on-off switch !! I have had trouble with other garden lights that do have a switch,even twice the price as these,and the switches on some become shorted out after and sometimes before a full season of use!!! These lights,however, could be a bit more brighter,but it may be due to the fact we have had a lot of cloudy and rainy days since I installed them!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bioski

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these lights that I have purchased recently. I decided to extend the area that I wanted illuminated because I was so pleased with the results. I recommend these. The seller contacted me to make sure I was satisfied with the purchase and to check to see if there was a problem (no problem). How's that for customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Louis Gal

customer_reviews.title: What I Needed!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. The stakes do brake off somewhat easily, so be careful, but they work great and look awesome! I’ve had them for a year now and still going strong! I’m leaving a 5 star review, not only because I love these lights and would buy again, but their customer service is stellar. I asked them if they had any stakes I could buy separately because I had several brake, and they replaced the whole box for me. Great product, great company.
customer_reviews.author: SDK.4

customer_reviews.title: Work great for a short time, but not for long.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very nice right out of the box and worked fairly well for a few months, but the solar panel on the top of the light does not hold up well to the weather. The panel begins to fade and get discolored which prevents the light from recharging, and the battery drains fairly quickly. I’ve had to change out these batteries at least twice so far which is added cost, but they don’t seem to recharge because of the defective solar panels on top. The company did replace two defective lights for me rather quickly, but all of the other ones in the set are now pretty useless. Disappointed in the quality of these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not excellent
customer_reviews.text: The lights are 100% plastic. For the price, they are not bad. 3 out of 30 light did not work. They initially worked, but were not able to recharge. You cant return just 3. You have to return all 10 or none.
customer_reviews.author: JMZE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, prompt courteous service as well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchases two sets of these lights for a a little meditation garden in our back yard. The price for the quantity was reason for selecting them. I was absolutely delighted with how well these lights worked and pleased with my choice. Several lights I each box of ten, however, did not work, so I emailed gardenjoyproducts as they requested I do if there were any problems. They are sending me 6 new lights and do not expect us to return the damaged ones. They were prompt and courteous and lived up to their promise of making the customer happy. I wouldn't hesitate to deal with this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Skwire

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well, easy to install. Installed 4 of the lights in the same area, each receiving the same amount of sunlight (full).. The first night, one of the lamps did not light; on subsequent nights I never had all 4 lamps illuminate. One night, I would have 3 lights on, the next maybe 2. The light output was a little less than I had hoped for but would have been acceptable if they had worked. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: nightsky99

customer_reviews.title: Solar panels unglued on every unit. Don't buy unless you want to fix them in a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, after a few months the solar panels have unglued away from the base on every one of these lights. Now they all look like garbage in my yard. Will probably toss them out in the spring. Huge waste of money, won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomasbeau

customer_reviews.title: Short period of light
customer_reviews.text: First the units are very easy to assemble. However the length the lights stay on is disappointing. Two of the lights only stay lit for a few hours and only one stayed lit throughout the night. They are all stationed in the same area with full Florida sunlight for at least 7 hours. The batteries that came with the unit are only 200 mAh (very low). Will try a higher energy (1500mAh) and I assume they will last much longer, but batteries aren't cheap! Update: Tried a 1000 and 1500 mAh and both of the lights stayed on all night. Definitely need batteries with more power if you want them to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: RSS

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this purchase. The lights arrived promptly. They all lit (except for one) and are lining the walkway on my front lawn, remaining lit from dusk for at least the following 6 hours. The company responded about the light that did not work and immediately replaced it, and an additional one. This was a good purchase..pretty lights and amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and Produces Lots of Light!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I really liked these solar lights, so much I bought another set! We have them lined up our walkway and around the path in our backyard and it really gives it enough light to see where you're going. Setup is easy. Customer service was so friendly, very communicative, and you can tell they stand behind their product. I would highly recommend these solar lights!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Company was more than helpful
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** Company had contacted me and sent a new set. Which works great, they last longer into the night and early morning hours! When they work they work. Got them one month ago tomorrow.... 2 stopped working and wont charge or even give out a dim light. I tried moving them around, away from shade but still not giving out any. Reading more reviews I realized everyone has this issue. Not worth $40 wont be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: L. C.

customer_reviews.title: Superior Customer Service and Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very bright on my quarter mile long driveway. I purchased 5 sets and had a few that didn't last, and I happened to find their little flyer with a smiley face on one side and a frowny face on the other and decided to send in my input. Turns out the customer service was exceptional and they sent me a whole new set! I highly recommend them- they definitely stand behind their product
customer_reviews.author: Monique de Quay-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very cute and reasonably priced. After about a month, two of the lights quit working. New batteries didn't do the trick. I reached out to the seller and asked for replacements at N/C. They responded almost immediately and more than obliged by offering to send SEVERAL new ones. Their customer service was prompt and courteous. I am still pleased with the lights as they really add a nice, clean look to the exterior of our home. I reccomend them even with the little hiccup of a couple defective ones, as their customer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 50%  Reliability
customer_reviews.text: I have had product 4 months, only 5 of the 10 are still working. Be care full not to bump once installed, the plastic spike breaks really easy. I do like the brightness but would not buy these again. The company reached out and sent more lights to replace the ones that where not working. I revised rating for great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Savage

customer_reviews.title: Choose these and you will be glad
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many solar lights over the years only to have them break, or the brightness is crummy. What I love about this set is that they give you an extension to make them higher, and the end that sticks in the ground is sturdy. Plus, the lights are bright white. Lastly, the top is snug and doesn't easily fall off in a strong wind.
customer_reviews.author: june d barnard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I installed these lights 3 weeks ago and already 3 of them have conked out. They were easy to install, don't give off that much light but were fine for my small garden. The lights are exposed to sunlight every day, but I wonder if the heavy rain was the cause of the malfunction. But they should have lasted more than 3 weeks. 8/8 update. Had a major rain storm last night and all lights were out. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: john d'angelo

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap, plain and simple
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Had to do some soderibg to make the lights work. Very very poor craftsmanship. Do not recommend, will never buy again. Not worth the price. Find another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: These are ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, but only if you get that relatively cheap. The light is bright enough though. Construction is relatively good/sturdy plastic. The batteries provided don't last very long / aren't very good. In winter, the day length is only enough to charge them to last an hour or two ... which means they ran out by 8pm in some places. Maybe new batteries would fix that .. and summers are probably ok.
customer_reviews.author: OmNomNomNom

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Well I moved to a new place and it had a messed up back ally. I hired gardeners to clean up the ally. I placed these lights and you can get good light from these small solar sticks. I water the ally daily so grass can grow and the solar lights don't get effected by water. Cool item for great price.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Colbian

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent instructions and customer service! I mean, they contact you before, during and after the sale. If you have any problems, you know how to get in touch with them. Mine worked fine from the beginning. Easy to assemble, as long as you follow the instructions. But read the instructions as these have an on-off button and it is important you pull the battery tab off so the battery makes contact. Not rocket science but for those who don't read, you may have a problem(but only created by your refusal to read the instructions first!!). They work well and I love the bright light, although not too bright but certainly enough to light your way. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SandyG

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these Jan 7, ‘19; had to replace batteries during the summer. I replaced with Duracell and had no problem. Took these light down in November to use Christmas decor lights. Put these back up last week and some were not working. Replaced with all new batteries and still 3 don’t work. Can’t find how long the warranty is for. But, think I will look for something else
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These solar lights are all plastic but very sturdy. They are easy to assemble and offer two different heights. I use mine for walkway lighting and in planters on my patio. Compared to other, more expensive sets, they are much larger and brighter. I also like the support that the company offers, they stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika Joy

customer_reviews.title: good solar lights
customer_reviews.text: At first i made the purchase of 10 solar lights, then when they arrived i charged the batteries for 2 days and when i installed them around my front walkway and only 6 worked, So i did contacted the seller and he replaced those 4 and added 2 more for total of 6 solar lights, that was great coming from the seller.. I do recommend this seller, there is not buts, I need this or that in other words he will replace the defective lights, NO QUESTIONS ASKED.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: let there be light
customer_reviews.text: these are very easy to assemble, with two different height options. our front lawn looks great with these beautiful lights. don't bother buying cheap lights because you get what you pay for and will have to replace next season. these are good-priced and seem sturdy enough to last a long time
customer_reviews.author: ceil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several sets of these types of lights in the past but these are definitely the best so far where quality and performance are concerned. The light is very "white" and although they don't light up my deck, they're lovely accent lights which is exactly what I was looking for. I live in the Caribbean where we get plenty of sun but even on a cloudy day without a lot of sun (and a couple of them are in shady areas) they come right on as soon as night falls and stay on until dawn - about 11 hours later. They're nicely made, handle downpours of rain with no problem and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: oldtart

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lights in early February and when they arrived 2 out of the 10 didn't work. After posting a somewhat critical review, I was contacted by email by Garden Joy's customer service representative. She offered to replace the 2 lights that didn't work, plus add a third light, and also offered a full refund. I declined the refund but did ask for the 3 lights. They came within a week and work just fine. I am now very satisfied with the lights and, more to the point, the way this matter was handled by Garden Joy. This matter was handled very professionally and I would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: MGoBlue

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These lights are useful for what we are using them for. However they are made of a very cheap plastic and if you barley touch them the base will break. Also have had the product for a few weeks and already one of the lights isn't taking a charge and won't light up. However, when I only paid a few bucks I didn't expect much and frankly for the price I believe they are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Totally marginal and unimpressive.  Total loss
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these because if reviews that said they were relatively bright and lasted a fair amount of time. I had no great expectations for solar lights but thought these would be at least above average. They are not. They are no better than cheap ones from anywhere else and totally unimpressive. Most likely glint to trash them and keep trying. Even from a long time exposed to direct sunlight they don’t last more than a couple hours. Learned my lesson to not pay attention to reviews as they seem to be paid for most of them time. These can no way love you to even limited expectations.
customer_reviews.author: RGVA

customer_reviews.title: Great Solar Pathway Lights
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the lights had two height options. I used the tall and they look great. The batteries are AA. They're very easy to take in and out unlike some. I put all the batteries in the charger just to make sure. All of which charged full in less than 5 minutes. They provide a very nice white lite.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: These are the best as they really are waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the description states they are double sealed to be waterproof. Ohio has been getting alot of rain in the last few weeks and these haven't filled up with water like all the others I've bought in the past. They look beautiful at night as they are bright and I love them with the extender piece to give them added height. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Out of 20 we have 5-8 that work. We’ve fiddled and removed battery and put back in. When we put them together and removed the light strip, we made sure they all worked before putting into landscaping. It’s been bright and sunny every day. And still just a few work. Knew I was taking a chance with the low price, but shouldn’t at least half of them work??
customer_reviews.author: JULIE HUFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Average product
customer_reviews.text: I think their “Garden Bliss story” printed in the description got to me. Lol. I honestly thought I was getting a higher quality product then the many similar solar lights I purchased in the past. Unfortunately same as all the others. Used for about two months two lights not working. Kind of disappointing good marketing though I definitely talked me into buying the product. It says 30000 guaranteed hours. I did not save the box and maybe I’m missing the contact seller button?
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lights to decorate my garden/flower beds, they arrived on time and was easily assembled. The lights work as intended, it lights up my garden. However, one of the lights was defected, customer service was awesome. They immediately sent out two replacement lights.
customer_reviews.author: paula george

customer_reviews.title: One by one they stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: After receiving I replaced the original batteries with 2500 mA brand names ones realizing these should remain lit all night long in sunny Florida. One by one they apparently stopped recharging the batteries. Ordered 2 packs of 10 and most are dead after originally working on factory charged batteries. Very disappointed. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: texvegas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little lights so far. They look nice, go together easy and have 2 length options. Also they light up nicely, but I am not lighting a path with them, so I can’t speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: CMCowan

customer_reviews.title: Does not last. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: ****UPDATED REVIEW 5/2016**** Originally these little lights were great (ordered 5/2015). By the fall there were one or 2 that did not seem to stay lit as long as the rest. Now, almost exactly a year after purchase none of them work. I have tried cleaning the solar panels to make sure it wasn't just grime preventing them from charging, but alas they are still not working. Very disappointed and looking for replacements. Save your money and buy something else. Great quality solar lights for the price. Would surely recommend over pricier big box store kits. They are bright and as far as I can tell last all night!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Work when they want to.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in June 2019 to highlight a particular area of our yard. They are full sun for at least six hours a day. I've noticed several of the lights are sporadic when they light. Some come on each evening, then won't work the next night. As I said, I bought them to accent our rock garden and line the walkway to the front porch. We have an LED security light and that does effect some of the lanterns. I've tried moving them around to see if they would light,but no go. Night before last,all lanterns were out. That's what prompted this review.
customer_reviews.author: Sydonna

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! They are plastic where I would normally go metal so I like them more at night but absolutely love them for the price! All of them worked right out of the box and they give a nice glow at night, perfectly accepting our patio and sidewalk, as well as the front of our house. I'm happy to say even in mostly shade these lights go all night. If you like plastic landscaping lights these are the right way to go. Happy I listened to other reviews and ordered two boxes instead of just one.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Garden Bliss Solar Lights. They are well constructed and I sure will hold up for some time. The lights we had before had wires connected to the battery compartment and in time, the wires disconnected and we were unable to repair them. Garden Bliss lights are bright and we use them along our sidewalk for safety in walking and along our driveway so drivers are led safely along our drive. We are in a rural area, so we don't have any other lighting available.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Already Breaking
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and took the plunge. They work great but are already breaking after only 2 months, 2 of the lamps are dead, 3 of the posts have snapped, 1 of the stakes broke and 1 of the connector pieces as well. They are pretty when they are on at night but definately cheap. Hoping the lifetime guarantee isn't a gimmick and thry will replace the pieces that are broken. I will update the review as I go through the process. At this time, I would not bi y them again and have not recommended them to people who have asked about the product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb D.

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely unbelievably good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review. I had reviewed these lights as being unsatisfactory, and two stars, because after 15 months and over this horrible summer that we just went through in Georgia, all of the lamps I had bought had suffered sun damage to the solar cells. AFter writing that review, the seller reached out to me, and at no cost to me as replaced all of my lights. It is rare, if ever, I have seen customer service so dedicated to customer satisfaction. I am looking forward to having my walkway lights functioning again, especially as they were a gift for my wife. A decent product for the money, sure. But unforgettable customer service, that's what I'm talking about!
customer_reviews.author: Colton Wade Bennett

customer_reviews.title: White glow, light weight, packaged well
customer_reviews.text: We love the lights. They give a very white light like the stars. The packaging is compact and light. I bought them on a recent trip to the States for my home on Rural Tanzania. So I traveled with them half around the world in my luggage. We recently installed them in our compound and on the wall of compound. They did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: The Black Mzungu

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay on all night
customer_reviews.text: When I reviewed another set of these I thought they were great, now not so much. I woke up at 5 am today .It was still dark. All the lights were out. I went out and put my hand over the sensor and it still wouldn't light. These lights were in the sun all day and what's the battery for? I will try to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Solar Lights
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered two packages of the Gardenbliss Solar lights and was very impress with the quality of the product. However, I had two of the solar lights that did not worked and with an email explaining the issue, Gardenbliss replaced them immediately. The lighting has really enhanced our driveway and flower bed area. I would highly recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Solar power charging and led bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Received the package of 10 GardenBliss Best Solar Lights. Very easy to assemble the posts to lights. Placed lights next to driveway. Had small issue with 3 of the lights not staying on very long, but contacted the company and they replaced the lights very quickly. Would highly recommend these lights and this company! Pleasure doing business with them.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Larson

customer_reviews.title: Okay material but don't light up long at all.
customer_reviews.text: I would ditch the stock batteries instantly. Even with much more expensive and powerful batteries they only light up for a couple hours at night. Wanted ones to light up all night long so can see the steps coming home from work. Not these, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality posts
customer_reviews.text: The plastic posts on these lights are extremely flimsy. Although able to hold the light in place, I can see they will not be durable, over time. A couple have already cracked. I will likely have to find a way to replace them. Update: a few days after I posted my review, I was contacted by the customer support team, at Garden Bliss. The follow up, and make it right attitude was excellent. I received replacement lights, without having to go through the inconvenience of returning the defects. The stainless steel lights that came, are of much better quality, and are perfect, with respect to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reid

customer_reviews.title: GardenBliss Best Solar Lights For Outdoor Pathway
customer_reviews.text: The lights were received right on time and there was only a minor issue of one battery being a bit loose but that was an easy fix.....it was removed and reseated and works fine. The lights were charged up yesterday morning and were able to be placed around sunset. We are enjoying them scattered around in our landscaping.
customer_reviews.author: Montgomery Household

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived in perfect condition! Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived in perfect condition! Easy to assemble, every light worked when I removed the battery protecting tab, every light was perfectly intact. They illuminate in the dark, and turn off in sunlight. These lights are entirely plastic, so waterproof should not be a problem. Time will tell how they hold up to constant outdoor exposure. I did purchased an extended warranty, as lights similar to these did not last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Cokefair

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these lights for a renovation project, they added the perfect amount of detail to the property. They were shipped and received quickly, and work great !! Easy to install, bright LED lighting for being solar powered. One light did not work, I contacted customer service by replying to the shipping email and was not only set a replacement but 10 extra lights since the replacement was back ordered. Great company as well, they follow to make sure you received the package and if everything works properly. I will be purchasing these lights again in the future for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jordan

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are small and completely made out of plastic. They work OK but certainly not as well as the much more expensive version from Costco. The Costco lights are mainly glass and metal, much larger and put out a lot more light. So you get what you pay for once again.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for two reasons: 1) I would get 10 of them, instead of 4 or 6, and 2) There were 1,600+ reviews with an average 4 star rating. They did not live up to expectations. Within 2 months, several of the lights had stopped working all together, even when the battery was replaced. One stopped working within the first couple weeks. At least Amazon took them back after the return window when I explained my complaint. I would not recommend purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: amitiel

customer_reviews.title: Light The Way
customer_reviews.text: My god daughter installed these for me in the front yard. They are not too bright but they help illuminate the pathway at night. They stay on almost all night! They are a blue LED hue and I wish they were more of a golden light, but they work well and look good.
customer_reviews.author: "Raven"

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on straight-forward outdoor lighting. Quality service.
customer_reviews.text: These are what everyone is looking for. They work great, are straight-forward and easy to assemble. They come with batteries inserted. Just make sure to remove the tab under them. Great product. Very pleased. Pleasant experience. Well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE--a company that really cares and goes above and beyond to make sure that you are Completely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the level of Customer Service from GardenJoy. I wrote a previous response indicating that an LED Solar panel was unglued and wasn't working as well as the others. Additionally there were 2 lights not working properly. We had just moved into our new home and really didn't have the time to follow-up. Unsolicited, GardenJoy read my review and sent me an email--WOW, I thought all reviews fell on "deaf ears" but GardenJoy stepped up and sent me 4 new lights immediately--Great Job and would highly recommend buying from GardenJoy--the Lights are all working great! WELL DONE!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: One year later, they still give light but most of the posts are broken
customer_reviews.text: We bought these given the value for money, and we got what we paid for. They worked quite well last summer, and we were basically happy. The longevity of the plastic shafts is not great, however. In the fall, they started breaking off. Half of them didn't really make it through the winter. So now we have lots of lights just lying on the ground and we need to purchase something else. If you're interested in a quick / cheap fix, these are the way to go. If you'd like something to last more than a season, buy something else. The assembly is straight forward. So don't worry on that front if you do decide to go for it.
customer_reviews.author: SDF

customer_reviews.title: Good for a budget but not long term use
customer_reviews.text: They do not hold up to the hype that is put forth on the product display. Bought a set for my wife for Christmas they died in May and so amazon replaced them this is now August and two already do not work without tapping it or moving the battery or some form of touching it. I don’t understand what is wrong with them. I will purchase a different set next time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solar light worth the purchase and great seller.
customer_reviews.text: There has been a few that did not work of the 40 lights purchased. However, the company responded immediately to this problem and is in process of sending me a box of 10. I would rate the company a 5 star, but this review is for the product, not the company. I do recommend this solar light to prospective buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Excellent LED Solar Pathway Lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights are excellent. They are attractive and put out a very good amount of light for your sidewalk. One excellent feature is that they have a easy access to the battery, so it will be easy to replace batteries as they inevitably wear out. I would purchase again, if I needed more LED Solar lights.
customer_reviews.author: L Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is very nice
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to install, they’re just cheap as hell. The stakes are flimsy and snap with little pressure. Cheapest lights I’ve ever purchased. Do not recommend! Update 6/21/20 They sent me a new box of lights after seeing my review, must say the customer service is top notch :)
customer_reviews.author: Brad Braithwaite

customer_reviews.title: Instructions came and they were easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get these after reading the reviews. Instructions came and they were easy to put together. The first night, a couple did not light up so I waited it out and a couple more stopped lighting after several days. However, I'm giving this 5 stars because the seller communicated via email and made sure everything was to my satisfaction. When I mentioned a few didn't work, they sent replacement ones. This absolutely makes up for the ones that don't work since when they do work, it's very pretty. The whole set of lights are definitely worth it. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Best lights I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: These lights are super bright with leaving my garden glowing at night. Even there customer service is amazing. I had a couple lights that didn’t work and they are working on sending me replacements as we speak. I would totally recommend you buying these and give them a try
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to patio and sidewalk lighting!
customer_reviews.text: Lights were installed along the sidewalk leading from the driveway to our front door and also in the patio area in back of the house. These solar lights are much brighter and more durable than several other brands that I've tried in the past. The are easy to insert into the ground and also remove. Furthermore, I'm very impressed with their water resistance. In particular, several are exposed to a lot of water from our irrigation system, but haven't shorted out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Herron

customer_reviews.title: GARDEN JOY SOLAR - great value, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: a little dim for driveway use but excellent path lighting and great followup service department. i thought two of the lights were having trouble booting up (turns out the shipping paper separating the battery from the contact wasn't removed properly) so i contacted GARDEN JOY by email. 'no problem' they said and shipped me two replacement units immediately! now i'm embarrassed cause both of the 'faulty units' work fine. but i'm hoping this positive review will balance the scales. great buy @ less than $4 apiece and a decent company stands behind them 100%!
customer_reviews.author: noel stookey

customer_reviews.title: Company stands behind product
customer_reviews.text: The quality is pretty good and I liked the dual height option, but the batteries didn't seem to hold a charge as long as I expected and about 4 of them barely stay on for more that an hour or so. The company did contact me and replaced the entire set. The new ones are working fine and I relocated the first set so they are getting more sun and they are working well too. I initially had them on the east side of our home so they were not getting quite as much sun. Great job by the seller!!
customer_reviews.author: H Mek

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE NO LONGER WORKING AFTER ONLY A FEW  MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: These worked pretty decently for the first month and then they started going out one by one (although one never really lit up at all but I asn't going to complain about that). They were delivered on 2/7/18 and 3/4 of them are no longer working and it is only 5 months later. I live in South Florida so I have plenty of sunshine. I would like to think a product would last longer than a few months. If possible I would like a replacement set to see if my set was just defective
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: These are a delight to have in my front yard. Even my neighbors have complimented me on them. Easy to assembly, just peel the sticker off, select the size stem you want because you get tall or short, and place outside in the sun to charge. That night your lights are up and running. We just had a huge El Nino rain and they survived so they are sturdy. I never thought these lights could make my yard look richer in the dark. If you're having second thoughts, don't. Buy, buy, buy.
customer_reviews.author: Havilla

customer_reviews.title: No response from seller
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled the tabs out of the lights, one of them stayed on. It would not go off and it was light out. Now it won't go on. Tried contacting seller twice with no response. I would like them to send me one new light.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lights for the Yard Light Guy!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm obsessed with putting lights everywhere outside....and I've tried several different styles and brands. To date, these are the best solution I've found. They are plastic and not indestructible but they are much better quality that something you would buy at Walmart. I’ve purchased two sets and have not had any issues with any of the 20 lights. The replaceable battery is a very nice feature (though I haven’t had to replace any yet). Mine have been purchased for aesthetic purposes not to light up a football field. Overall I’m very pleased with these lights and plan on buying more to fuel my obsession :) Solid purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: christopher lance leland

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure
customer_reviews.text: They look great. I can't say anything about the durability because I haven't had them long enough. Not sure how long the battery lasts...again I haven't had them long enough. I did call them saying I woke up at 5 am and most of the lights were out. They responded quickly, which is a good thing, saying they lasted 8-9 hours which is normal. I was hoping they'd be lit through the darkness. But, darkness starts about 7:30pm and lasts till about 6:30am this time of year. So, in short, LOL, these are great lights.
customer_reviews.author: Marlen

customer_reviews.title: Great Solar Lights!!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, well-constructed (unlike so many others), solar lights. They remain bright all night long and compliment my landscaping perfectly. If you are on the fence about purchasing these--don't be. You won't be disappointed. If you have any concerns or questions, the customer service is exceptional. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: funexnm

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lights! but.....
customer_reviews.text: The product was packaged nice. They appeared to be nice lights. The second day that I had them up my pathway 2 of the lights did not work. I contacted the company and they replaced them. Now they are about a month old up my walkway 3 lights do not work. My walkway is not covered by any tree so they do receive adequate sunlight, I believe they just don't recharge themselves. I am going to replace them with another set from another company. I really would not recommend them for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Louis a. DiSantis

customer_reviews.title: They give off great lighting
customer_reviews.text: Considering they are not wired, they are worth the price. Easy to put together and install. I only had them in the ground for 2 weeks, so we'll see how long they lasts. UPDATE: I loved these solar lights so much that I ordered a 2nd set, however, my 1st set doesn't stay on all night. It might be a battery issue so I'm going to buy some new batteries and put them in and see what happens
customer_reviews.author: Denise Williams

customer_reviews.title: Provides nice light, and good customer service...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as accessory yard lighting. Simple to put together and install. We had a problem with one of them - and customer service responded quickly. We've had them for a few months, and they seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My previous yard lights were electric with a control unit that costs about $90. I’ve replaced it before. This time I decided to go solar. So happy I did. Half the cost of a new control unit, plus no electricity costs. Stick the solar lights in and your done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GardenBliss Best Solar Lights For Outdoor Pathway, 10 Brightest Light Set For Walkway, Patio, Path, Lawn, Garden, Yard Decor, Double Waterproof Seal, Large Led Landscape Outside Post Lighting Lamps
feature_bullets: #1 BRIGHTEST SOLAR LIGHTS TO GIVE LIGHT IN DARKNESS! Get ready to fall in love with the brightest outdoor solar lights on the market today! We created our lights larger in size, with longer-lasting batteries, and high-end style to provide you with the brightest white lighting for your yard! Transform your outside walkways, gardens, and patios into a beautiful heaven-on-Earth with our premium-value, 10 piece set! #winning

GOING GREEN HAS NEVER LOOKED THIS GOOD… We know you care deeply about responsibly saving our environment and that you desire to use smart and renewable energy sources wherever possible. That’s why we are so excited to offer you our deluxe GardenBliss Solar Garden Lights! Not only do they use the power and abundance of solar energy, but they also look beautiful in your yard. Get ready to take your landscape to a perfect 10 with our elegant and highly-efficient outdoor lighting set!

TASTEFUL. ELEGANT. SMART. When it comes to the quality and style of outdoor solar lights, our GardenBliss Lights outshines all the rest. We thoughtfully focused on every aspect of our Garden Lights-- from the performance, to the durability, to the appeal. We included the highest-performing batteries, the longest-lasting LED lights, and the most attractive design to give you the best lighting experience possible! You will feel proud displaying our elegant lights in your yard!

THE PERFECT GIFT FOR PROUD HOME OWNERS— If you are looking for the ultimate gift for that classy friend in your life, then you may want to consider giving them our premium GardenBliss solar garden lights. They will be the favorite gift that keeps on giving for years to come of outdoor fun and enjoyment! Provides superior lighting for summer barbecues, weddings, parties, and landscape decor. Be like Prometheus, and give the gift of light!

LASTS 30,000+ HOURS — GUARANTEED! There is a big reason we are the top-rated outdoor solar lights. We believe in treating our amazing customers like family! You can expect to receive the brightest, most durable, and elegant solar-powered outdoor lights or your money-back! If you aren’t 100% happy with our superior landscape lights, we will provide you with a full refund. You can click the yellow “Add to Cart” Button today with confidence-- knowing you are getting the very best!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars4,728 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
